QuestData.Title: Unbelievable!
QuestData.Description:
I simply refuse to believe the guards will not grant us entry to the monastery should we impress upon them the seriousness of the situation.
Friend, go east, to the sentinel in front of the Monastery, and demand admittance. I will come with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the Shado-Pan Monastery Sentinel to gain entrance to the Shado-Pan Monastery.
QuestData.RewardText: No... this is worse than I could have possibly imagined. The monastery itself has been compromised...
